title: ISic020400. ISic020400
body:
Facsimile Images

((sign_uninterpreted))Λ´( vac. 1)Ι´[---]

Apparatus criticus

Text after photograph.

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

According to Agostiniani (2021, p. 18) the first letter (or sign) is perhaps a sigma with 5 strokes, well attested in the graffiti from Grotta Vanella; the second letter a lambda, perhaps the Attic numeral for '5'; the third one a vertical stroke, perhaps the Attic numeral for '1'.

bibliography

  • Agostiniani 2021 400 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002320
